member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat
member.summary: Enum representing the remind later time span.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Minutes
member.summary: Represents the time span in minutes.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Hours
member.summary: Represents the time span in hours.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.RemindLaterFormat.Days
member.summary: Represents the time span in days.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater
member.summary: Main class that lets you auto update applications by setting some static fields and executing its Start method.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.AppTitle
member.summary: Set the Application Title shown in Update dialog. Although AutoUpdater.NET will get it automatically, you can set this property if you like to give custom Title.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.AppCastURL
member.summary: URL of the xml file that contains information about latest version of the application.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.OpenDownloadPage
member.summary: Opens the download url in default browser if true. Very usefull if you have portable application.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ShowSkipButton
member.summary: If this is true users can see the skip button.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ShowRemindLaterButton
member.summary: If this is true users can see the Remind Later button.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.LetUserSelectRemindLater
member.summary: If this is true users see dialog where they can set remind later interval otherwise it will take the interval from RemindLaterAt and RemindLaterTimeSpan fields.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.RemindLaterAt
member.summary: Remind Later interval after user should be reminded of update.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ReportErrors
member.summary: AutoUpdater.NET will report errors if this is true.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Proxy
member.summary: Set Proxy server to use for all the web requests in AutoUpdater.NET.

member.name: F:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.RemindLaterTimeSpan
member.summary: Set if RemindLaterAt interval should be in Minutes, Hours or Days.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ApplicationExitEventHandler
member.summary: A delegate type to handle how to exit the application after update is downloaded.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ApplicationExitEvent
member.summary: An event that developers can use to exit the application gracefully.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.CheckForUpdateEventHandler
member.summary: A delegate type for hooking up update notifications.
member.param: An object containing all the parameters recieved from AppCast XML file. If there will be an error while looking for the XML file then this object will be null.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.CheckForUpdateEvent
member.summary: An event that clients can use to be notified whenever the update is checked.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ParseUpdateInfoHandler
member.summary: A delegate type for hooking up parsing logic.
member.param: An object containing the AppCast file received from server.

member.name: E:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.ParseUpdateInfoEvent
member.summary: An event that clients can use to be notified whenever the AppCast file needs parsing.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Start(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Start checking for new version of application and display dialog to the user if update is available.
member.param: Assembly to use for version checking.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.Start(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Start checking for new version of application and display dialog to the user if update is available.
member.param: URL of the xml file that contains information about latest version of the application.
Assembly to use for version checking.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.AutoUpdater.DownloadUpdate
member.summary: Opens the Download window that download the update and execute the installer when download completes.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs
member.summary: Object of this class gives you all the details about the update useful in handling the update logic yourself.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.IsUpdateAvailable
member.summary: If new update is available then returns true otherwise false.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.DownloadURL
member.summary: Download URL of the update file.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.ChangelogURL
member.summary: URL of the webpage specifying changes in the new update.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Returns newest version of the application available to download.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.InstalledVersion
member.summary: Returns version of the application currently installed on the user's PC.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.Mandatory
member.summary: Shows if the update is required or optional.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.UpdateInfoEventArgs.InstallerArgs
member.summary: Command line arguments used by Installer.

member.name: T:AutoUpdaterDotNET.ParseUpdateInfoEventArgs
member.summary: An object of this class contains the AppCast file received from server..

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.ParseUpdateInfoEventArgs.RemoteData
member.summary: Remote data received from the AppCast file.

member.name: P:AutoUpdaterDotNET.ParseUpdateInfoEventArgs.UpdateInfo
member.summary: Set this object with values received from the AppCast file.

member.name: M:AutoUpdaterDotNET.ParseUpdateInfoEventArgs.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: An object containing the AppCast file received from server.
member.param: A string containing remote data received from the AppCast file.
